footer.description: From professional to professional. Distributor of heating, air conditioning, refrigeration, and ventilation materials.

hero.title: From professional to professional
hero.subtitle: Sumiclima is your trusted partner in the distribution of heating, air conditioning, industrial and commercial refrigeration, ventilation, and air treatment materials.

products.title: The professional warehouse
products.subtitle: We have a wide range of products in stock exclusively related to the sector, at very competitive prices.

team.title: Experience and commitment
team.subtitle: Our human team, with over 40 years of experience, offers modern solutions, technical advice, and professional support for your projects.

hero.title: About us
hero.subtitle: Over 40 years providing professional HVAC solutions.

history.title: Our history
history.p1: Sumiclima was founded more than four decades ago with a clear goal: to be the trusted partner for professionals in the HVAC, heating, ventilation, and refrigeration sector. From the beginning, we focused on service quality, stock availability, and personalized technical advice.
history.p2: Today we continue growing alongside our clients, incorporating the latest technologies, sustainable solutions, and leading brands in the market.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.mission_text: To be the trusted partner for installers and professionals in the sector, offering technical HVAC solutions with the best service, speed, and advice.
philosophy.vision_text: To establish ourselves as the national reference in professional HVAC distribution, promoting innovation and sustainability in every project.

team.title: Our team
team.p1: Behind every order, technical advice, and delivery is a human team with extensive experience in the sector. Technicians, advisors, and specialists who share the same passion: providing the best service to HVAC professionals.
team.p2: At Sumiclima, professionalism and closeness are our best guarantee.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.intro: Do you have questions? Need a quote? You can send us a message and we will reply as soon as possible. Thank you!
contact.direct: Or if you prefer, contact us more directly.
